alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 18 at 7:44AM MST until December 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 11 to 16 inches possible. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, and Pierce. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from this evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
